card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NFor this card's Synchro Summon, you can treat 1 "World Chalice" Normal Monster you control as a Tuner. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ib the World Chalice Justiciar" once per turn.$N●If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "World Legacy" card from your Deck to your hand.$N●If this Synchro Summoned card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "World Chalice" monster from your Deck or GY, except "Ib the World Chalice Justiciar".
